# rate

**Instance Property**

The current playback rate.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var rate: Float { get set }
```

## Controlling playback

- **defaultRate**: A default rate at which to begin playback.
- **play()**: Begins playback of the current item.
- **pause()**: Pauses playback of the current item.
- **rateDidChangeNotification**: A notification that a player posts when its rate changes.
